item.title: Windowsvslinux
item.description: this whole page was a pain to make as windows likes to have file loss and shoot me many times! Windows: elevatebuild.bat (to copy .git files) :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: Elevate.cmd - Version 4 :: Automatically check & get admin rights :: see "https://stackoverflow.com/a/12264592/1016343" for description :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: @echo off CLS ECHO. ECHO ============================= ECHO Running Admin shell ECHO ============================= :init setlocal DisableDelayedExpansion set cmdInvoke=1 set winSysFolder=System32 set "batchPath=%~0" for %%k in (%0) do set batchName=%%~nk set "vbsGetPrivileges=%temp%\OEgetPriv_%batchName%.
